charges.charge_description: 21:841A=ND.F NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE: Conspiracy to distribute and possess with intent to distribute cocaine (count 1) Distribution and possession with intent to distribute cocaine base (count 2 &; 3) Distribution and possession with intent to distribute cocaine (count 4) (1s)

charges.charge_disposition: Thirty (30) months imprisonment folowed by a four (4) year term of Supervised Release. Fine waived. $50.00 Special Assessment. (1s)

charges.charge_description: 21:841A=ND.F NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE a substance containing cocaine base, a Schedule II controlled substance (1-3)

21:841A=ND.F NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE: Conspiracy to distribute and possess with intent to distribute cocaine (count 1) Distribution and possession with intent to distribute cocaine base (count 2 &; 3) Distribution and possession with intent to distribute cocaine (count 4) (2s-4s)

charges.charge_disposition: Upon motion by the government Counts 2(s) thru Counts4(s) dismissed. (2s-4s)

charges.charge_description: distribution and possession w/intent to distribute cocaine base and aiding and abetting the same, 21:841(a)(1), 18:2 [2:95-m-24]
